messages.subject: High interest books!
messages.msgSnippet: ... I m reposting this with a new subject line for those that might be heavy on the delete key right now. This is good info for kids looking for easy yet
messages.messageBody:
>From: SandraDodd@...
>Reply-To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
>To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] A speech against Tyranny
>Date: Mon, 12 Aug 2002 12:51:33 EDT
I'm reposting this with a new subject line for those that might be heavy on
the delete key right now. This is good info for kids looking for easy yet
interesting books!

Thanks Sandra.

Life is good.
~Mary

>BTW has Emily found some books that she enjoys reading? (It was you that
>was
>looking for suggestions right?) >>
>
>http://www.wieser-ed.com/
>
>There's a company supplying "high interest" books (low reading levels)!
>
>There are others. If you use google, use "remedial reading high interest"
>and those are the buzz words of the moment.
>
>I looked around a little, but it was too creepy for me being that deep into
>supplies created for teachers, so I need to go sew and hang out with Holly
>for a while to recover!
>
>Sandra
>
>
